name: SketchUp Q&A Generation Environment
install: pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m pip install --upgrade pip

terminals.name: Q&A Generation Monitor
terminals.command: python -c "print('🚀 SketchUp Q&A Generation Environment Ready!'); print('📁 Available scripts:'); print('  - generate_qa_ollama_all.py: Process all transcripts'); print('  - categorize_qa_by_content.py: Categorize Q&A content'); print('  - convert_to_excel.py: Convert to Excel format'); print('📊 Current status: Ready for Q&A generation')"
terminals.description: Shows the status of the Q&A generation environment and available scripts

terminals.name: File System Monitor
terminals.command: watch -n 5 'echo "📂 Current Q&A files:"; find output -name "*_QnA.md" | wc -l; echo "📄 Recent files:"; find output -name "*_QnA.md" -mtime -1 | head -5'
terminals.description: Monitors the file system for new Q&A files and shows recent additions

terminals.name: Git Status Monitor
terminals.command: watch -n 10 'echo "🔍 Git Status:"; git status --porcelain | head -10; echo "📈 Recent commits:"; git log --oneline -5'
terminals.description: Monitors Git status and shows recent commits for version control tracking
